titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a postage stamp should be issued in honor of Melvin Jones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) the United States Postal Service should issue a postage stamp in honor of Melvin Jones; and (2) the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such a postage stamp be issued.
